mapper.select:
select
from spu_sale_attr ssa inner join spu_sale_attr_value ssav on ssa.spu_id = ssav.spu_id and ssa.base_sale_attr_id = ssav.base_sale_attr_id where ssav.spu_id = #{spuId} order by ssa.id

select , if(sav.sku_id is null, 0, 1) is_checked from spu_sale_attr ssa inner join spu_sale_attr_value ssav on ssa.spu_id = ssav.spu_id and ssa.base_sale_attr_id = ssav.base_sale_attr_id left join sku_sale_attr_value sav on sav.sale_attr_value_id = ssav.id and sav.sku_id = #{skuId} where ssav.spu_id = #{spuId} order by ssav.base_sale_attr_id, ssav.id
